vault_database_secret_backend_connection.description: Configures a database secret backend connection for Vault.

name.description: A unique name to give the database connection.

backend.description: The unique name of the Vault mount to configure.

verify_connection.description: Whether the connection should be verified on

allowed_roles.description: A list of roles that are allowed to use this

root_rotation_statements.description: A list of database statements to be executed to rotate the root user's credentials.

data.description: A map of sensitive data to pass to the endpoint. Useful for templated connection strings.

cassandra.description: A nested block containing configuration options for Cassandra connections.

mongodb.description: A nested block containing configuration options for MongoDB connections.

hana.description: A nested block containing configuration options for SAP HanaDB connections.

mssql.description: A nested block containing configuration options for MSSQL connections.

mysql.description: A nested block containing configuration options for MySQL connections.

mysql_rds.description: A nested block containing configuration options for RDS MySQL connections.

mysql_aurora.description: A nested block containing configuration options for Aurora MySQL connections.

mysql_legacy.description: A nested block containing configuration options for legacy MySQL connections.

postgresql.description: A nested block containing configuration options for PostgreSQL connections.

oracle.description: A nested block containing configuration options for Oracle connections.

elasticsearch.description: A nested block containing configuration options for Elasticsearch connections.
